title: Onboard a New Managed Property
description: A property owner has signed a management agreement. The agent must set up the new property in the system.

tasks.description: Gather all property and owner information, including property details, owner contact info, and bank account details for distributions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary onboarding data.

tasks.description: Create a new property profile and owner profile in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately sets up the new property and owner in the system.

tasks.description: If the property is tenanted, enter all existing lease information into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly abstracts and enters data for existing tenants.
